GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users and their details

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves a specific review with full details

exampleResponse.title: Jenga
exampleResponse.review_body: Fiddly fun for all the family

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves a specific review with full details, updating votes key by number provided in incVotes object

exampleResponse.title: Jenga
exampleResponse.review_body: Fiddly fun for all the family

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments related to specified review

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves user full details of comment posted for specified review

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: serves empty object to client after deleting specified comment
